description: Surrogate primary key that uniquely identifies this migration column-mapping row.
Identifier of the migration job or batch this mapping belongs to; likely a foreign key to a migration definition table (confirm with SME).
Name of the source or logical input field from the legacy/landing fleet dataset being migrated.
Target column name or transformation expression used to populate the destination schema for this field.
Special migration directives, such as primary-key flags, foreign-key lookups, defaulting to current timestamp, or other rule indicators needed to resolve references and enforce constraints.
Constant default value applied when the source value is missing, null, or fails transformation; typically used to ensure required target fields are populated.
Identifier of the user or process that created this mapping record.
Timestamp when this mapping record was created.
Identifier of the user or process that last updated this mapping record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this mapping record.
